definition: see 一目十行[yi1 mu4 shi2 hang2]
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
ten/10
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
knowledgeable and perspicacious (idiom)
lit. to have only nine meals in thirty days (idiom)/fig. (of a family) on the brink of starvation/in dire straits
wide and knowledgeable/well-informed and experienced
clay ox, wooden horse (idiom); shape without substance/worthless object
to have a taste for the exotic (idiom)
fine horse/thoroughbred
river of literacy, sea of learning (idiom); ars longa, vita brevis
a wine cup dissolves complaints (idiom); a few drinks can ease social interaction
to bide one's time, waiting for an opportunity to stage a comeback in public life (idiom)
intelligent/bright
not shaken by poverty/to preserve one's ambitions although destitute
an outstanding talent (idiom)/surpassing insight and acumen
to be good at working for one's own profit (idiom)
lit. to wear one's coat inside out and carry firewood on one's back (idiom)/fig. to live a life of poverty and hard work/fig. to act stupidly
worrying
quick/bright/intelligent/clever/brilliant
